Derya,

The server was down for a while due to an attack by hackers. It is up 
now, so maybe try again. Due to security concerns, I have shut down 
the public CVS repository, so access to Cantera by CVS is not 
possible at present. But accessing it through the web should still 
work.

The 1D stagnation flow code will be delayed a bit, due to the press 
of other obligations... hopefully it won't be much longer though.

Dave Goodwin
